articles.title: Thailand starts banning the sale of cannabis without a prescription - AP News
articles.description: Thailand has started banning the sale of cannabis to those without a prescription, three years after becoming the first country in Asia to decriminalize the plant. The new order, signed by Health Minister Somsak Thepsutin earlier this week, came into effect T…
articles.content:
BANGKOK (AP) Thailand has started banning the sale of cannabis to those without a prescription, three years after becoming the first country in Asia to decriminalize the plant.
